greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for all such sequences b, for which b(A176997(k)) = constant for all k > 1, where A176997 is the union of odd primes and Fermat pseudoprimes.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..101101
program: partialsums(f,up_to) = { my(v = vector(up_to), s=0); for(i=1,up_to,s += f(i); v[i] = s); (v); }
xref: Differs from A305801 for the first time at n=341, where a(341) = 3, while A305801(341) = 275.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 01 2018
